text: Today we are working intensely on fine-tuning the filtering prompt. The goal is to reduce false positives from purely eco-physiological articles (such as sap flow) that lack a clear focus on water resources or catchment hydrology.

A backfilling script has been created and implemented. This tool will allow us to automatically retrieve and process relevant articles from previous months and years to complete the project's historical database.

We officially launch the BiblioAssistant website. This portal was born with the mission to automate the monitoring of scientific literature in hydrology and climate change, facilitating the synthesis work for researchers.
